articles.title: The Guardian's approach to generative AI - The Guardian
articles.description: Over the last three months, colleagues from our editorial, creative, engineering, product, legal, commercial and partnerships teams have set up a Guardian AI working group to consider how we respond to these risks and opportunities and to draft a set of Guard…
